mapper.select: select m.sku sku, a.*,wh.name warename,ifnull(i.quantity,0) invcount,ifnull(i2.quantity,0) inbound, m.name mname,IFNULL(pic.location,pic.url) image,m.color color,a.warehouseid warehouseid, round(a.amount/ifnull(f.amount,1),0) num,f.amount totalamount,m.delivery_cycle,m.supplier from t_erp_assembly_form_entry a left join t_erp_assembly_form f on f.id=a.formid left join t_erp_material m on a.materialid = m.id left join t_picture pic on m.image=pic.id left join t_erp_warehouse wh on wh.id=a.warehouseid left join t_erp_inventory i on i.warehouseid=a.warehouseid and i.materialid=a.materialid and i.`status`='fulfillable' left join t_erp_inventory i2 on i2.warehouseid=a.warehouseid and i2.materialid=a.materialid and i2.`status`='inbound_purchase' where a.formid = #{formid,jdbcType=CHAR} ;
select a.* from t_erp_assembly_form_entry a where a.formid = #{formid,jdbcType=CHAR} ;

select a.formid,f.number,w.name warehousename,m.sku mainsku ,m.name skuname,f.amount,f.auditstatus from t_erp_assembly_form_entry a left join t_erp_assembly_form f on f.id=a.formid left join t_erp_warehouse w ON w.id=f.warehouseid LEFT JOIN t_erp_material m ON m.id=f.mainmid where a.purchase_from_entry_id = #{entryid,jdbcType=CHAR} ;
